name: FunRiddles
0:
”Alexa, open fun riddles”
”Alexa, start fun riddles”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: fun riddles
des: Play an interesting game of fun quiz with Alexa. While playing the quiz, you can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next question. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the quiz. Solving riddles is fun you will enjoy so do try it.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
